resources.string: Record the activities you have done throughout the day, then complete your daily wellbeing log to check in on how things are going.
Do you want to complete one?
Find a list of all the activities you have completed
Here\'s how you\'ve done in the last 7 days

Connect is all about building relationships, in person or over video call it all counts, what really matters is that you spend time getting to know each other deeply, build a sense of trust, go deeper than the superficial, and most importantly make time to listen.

Be active is all about getting in some exercise, whether that be grabbing your yoga mat and taking on the downward dog, going for a short walk during your lunch break or training for your next marathon, make sure to keep it at a level you are comfortable with, if you don\'t feel better, change it up until you find something you love.

Take notice is all about taking the time to reflect, look at the bigger picture, how was your day today? Make the most of the little things, put that phone down, stop scrolling. Ah, that\'s better, now you can enjoy the moment.

Keep learning is all about taking time to learn what you love. Growing your skills and finding a real sense of achievement in what you love to do. Whether it be a new skill or String Theory, get out there and start learning.

Giving is all about using what you have to benefit someone else. Whether that be giving a smile or a quick nod of the head to a stranger as you pass by or donning the apron for a charity bake sale, it all counts.
Learn more about the five ways to wellbeing
Here is how your day is looking so far
Change the theme to dark, light or system default
Please choose a way to wellbeing
